      • sign

        public abstract RequestBase sign()
                          throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                 java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                 java.lang.IllegalStateException
        sign
        抛出:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if sign_type is other than MD5
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if Key or something else (related to algorithm) not found
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • sign

        protected java.lang.String sign(java.util.List<java.lang.String> paramNames,
                    java.lang.String signType,
                    java.lang.String key,
                    java.lang.String charset)
                         throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException,
                                java.lang.IllegalStateException
        参数:
        paramNames - key names to submit, in dictionary order
        signType - MD5/DSA/RSA/0001, currently supported MD5 only.
        charset - utf-8/gb2312, utf-8 recommended.
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

                            throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        experimental
        抛出:
